data.comment: The big names in today's match at Akhmat-Arena have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Igor Panin, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 4, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Ufa.
Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
Bernard Berisha (Akhmat Grozny) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 9, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Igor Panin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
An attacking Akhmat Grozny player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 14, Bernard Berisha smashes in a penalty at Akhmat-Arena. The score is now 1-0.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ufa.
Akhmat Grozny needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick Ufa.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 22, Ufa have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny are coming forward and Andrey Semenov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 23, Igor Panin awards Ufa a goal kick.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 26, Ufa to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Igor Panin signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to Akhmat Grozny's area.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 30, Igor Panin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Ufa's half.
Igor Panin waits before resuming play because Bernard Berisha for Akhmat Grozny is still down.
Bernard Berisha is back on his feet again.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 34, Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Grozny.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Andrey Semenov (Akhmat Grozny) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Konstantin Pliyev (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Akhmat Grozny are pushing forward but Vladimir Iljin's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Igor Panin signals a Ufa throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
In the minute 45, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Ufa at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
The match at Akhmat-Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov, who is down injured.
In the minute 50, Akhmat Grozny's Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Igor Panin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Jemal Tabidze (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Georgi Melkadze has recovered and rejoins the match in Grozny.
In the minute 53, Ismael Silva for Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Georgi Melkadze.
Igor Panin awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Bernard Berisha for Akhmat Grozny drives towards goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Azer Aliev is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Andrey Semenov in Akhmat Grozny has been yellow-carded a second time by Igor Panin and is being sent off.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In the minute 62, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) has taken off Georgi Melkadze who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Wilker Angel Romero is the replacement.
Ufa's Vyacheslav Krotov breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
In the minute 65, Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Akhmat Grozny's Vladimir Iljin misses with an attempt on goal.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Igor Panin awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Vladimir Iljin scores to make it 2-1 at Akhmat-Arena.
That's a fine assist from Bernard Berisha.
In the minute 70, Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andrey Talalaev is making the team's second substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Marat Bystrov replacing Vladimir Iljin.
In the minute 72, Bernard Berisha is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bernard Berisha returns to the field for Akhmat Grozny after picking up a slight injury.
Jemal Tabidze of Ufa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
Goal! Bernard Berisha extends Akhmat Grozny's lead to 3-1.
At Akhmat-Arena, Bernard Berisha has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 79, Bernard Berisha (Akhmat Grozny) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Islam Alsultanov.
Lechii Sadulaev is replacing Evgeny Kharin for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 81, Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Catalin Carp with Dmitri Sysuev. This is the first substitution made today by Rashid Rahimov.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 85, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Igor Panin.
Bojan Jokic is booked for the away team.
In the minute 87, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Igor Panin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 89, Igor Panin signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Ufa's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Free kick in a good position for Akhmat Grozny!
Throw-in for Ufa at Akhmat-Arena.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team replace Aleksandr Sukhov with Timur Zhamaletdinov.
